entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning then changing to rain near noon and ending in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2 except minus 6 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2 except minus 6 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
